name: R5-ManufacturedItemDefinition-R4B-ManufacturedItemDefinition
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 ManufacturedItemDefinition into FHIR R4B

element.display: The definition and characteristics of a medicinal manufactured item, such as a tablet or capsule, as contained in a packaged medicinal product

target.display: The definition and characteristics of a medicinal manufactured item, such as a tablet or capsule, as contained in a packaged medicinal product
target.comment: R5 `ManufacturedItemDefinition` maps as Equivalent to R4B `ManufacturedItemDefinition`

element.display: Physical parts of the manufactured item, that it is intrisically made from. This is distinct from the ingredients that are part of its chemical makeup
The measurable amount of total quantity of all substances in the component, expressable in different ways (e.g. by mass or volume)
A component that this component contains or is made from

A reference to a constituent of the manufactured item as a whole, linked here so that its component location within the item can be indicated. This not where the item's ingredient are primarily stated (for which see Ingredient.for or ManufacturedItemDefinition.ingredient)
The measurable amount of the substance, expressable in different ways (e.g. by mass or volume)
Additional content defined by implementations
The function of this constituent within the component e.g. binder
The ingredient that is the constituent of the given component
Unique id for inter-element referencing
The physical location of the constituent/ingredient within the component
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Additional content defined by implementations
The function of this component within the item e.g. delivers active ingredient, masks taste
Unique id for inter-element referencing
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
General characteristics of this component
Defining type of the component e.g. shell, layer, ink
Contained, inline Resources

target.comment: R5 `ManufacturedItemDefinition.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4B `ManufacturedItemDefinition.contained`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.comment: R5 `ManufacturedItemDefinition.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `ManufacturedItemDefinition.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`

element.display: Logical id of this artifact

target.comment: R5 `ManufacturedItemDefinition.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `ManufacturedItemDefinition.id`

element.display: Unique identifier

target.comment: R5 `ManufacturedItemDefinition.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4B `ManufacturedItemDefinition.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `ManufacturedItemDefinition.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4B `ManufacturedItemDefinition.implicitRules`

element.display: The ingredients of this manufactured item. Only needed if these are not specified by incoming references from the Ingredient resource

target.display: The ingredients of this manufactured item. Only needed if these are not specified by incoming references from the Ingredient resource
target.comment: R5 `ManufacturedItemDefinition.ingredient` maps as Equivalent to R4B `ManufacturedItemDefinition.ingredient`

element.display: Language of the resource content

target.comment: R5 `ManufacturedItemDefinition.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `ManufacturedItemDefinition.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred

element.display: Dose form as manufactured (before any necessary transformation)

target.display: Dose form as manufactured (before any necessary transformation)
target.comment: R5 `ManufacturedItemDefinition.manufacturedDoseForm` maps as Equivalent to R4B `ManufacturedItemDefinition.manufacturedDoseForm`

element.display: Manufacturer of the item, one of several possible

target.display: Manufacturer of the item (Note that this should be named "manufacturer" but it currently causes technical issues)
target.comment: R5 `ManufacturedItemDefinition.manufacturer` maps as Equivalent to R4B `ManufacturedItemDefinition.manufacturer`

element.display: Allows specifying that an item is on the market for sale, or that it is not available, and the dates and locations associated
Metadata about the resource

target.comment: R5 `ManufacturedItemDefinition.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4B `ManufacturedItemDefinition.meta`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored

target.comment: R5 `ManufacturedItemDefinition.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `ManufacturedItemDefinition.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

element.display: A descriptive name applied to this item
General characteristics of this item

target.comment: R5 `ManufacturedItemDefinition.property` maps as Equivalent to R4B `ManufacturedItemDefinition.property`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.comment: R5 `ManufacturedItemDefinition.property.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `ManufacturedItemDefinition.property.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.comment: R5 `ManufacturedItemDefinition.property.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `ManufacturedItemDefinition.property.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `ManufacturedItemDefinition.property.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `ManufacturedItemDefinition.property.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

element.display: A code expressing the type of characteristic

target.display: A code expressing the type of characteristic
target.comment: R5 `ManufacturedItemDefinition.property.type` maps as Equivalent to R4B `ManufacturedItemDefinition.property.type`

element.display: A value for the characteristic

target.comment: R5 `ManufacturedItemDefinition.property.value[x]` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `ManufacturedItemDefinition.property.value[x]` - value[x] has change due to type change: R5 value[x] markdown has no equivalent or mapped type in R4B value[x]; value[x] has change due to type change: R5 `value[x]` `Attachment` maps as RelatedTo for R4B `value[x]`; value[x] has change due to type change: R5 value[x] Reference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4B value[x]

element.display: draft | active | retired | unknown

target.comment: R5 `ManufacturedItemDefinition.status` maps as Equivalent to R4B `ManufacturedItemDefinition.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/publication-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/publication-status|4.3.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `ManufacturedItemDefinition.text` maps as Equivalent to R4B `ManufacturedItemDefinition.text`

element.display: The “real-world” units in which the quantity of the item is described

target.display: The “real world” units in which the quantity of the item is described
target.comment: R5 `ManufacturedItemDefinition.unitOfPresentation` maps as Equivalent to R4B `ManufacturedItemDefinition.unitOfPresentation`
